data.name: AutoComplete_Placeholder
data.value: Search by ID, document title, or client name
data.comment: Placeholder on Search bar for Outlook View

data.name: Failure_Invalid_Unpin
data.value: Document you are trying to unpin is not pinned.
data.comment: This is a failure message when user tries to unpin a document which is not pinned

data.name: Failure_Message
data.comment: This is a failure message for invalid service response

data.name: FilterRefinerAuthor
data.comment: Managed property / alias name for Author field

data.name: FilterRefinerCheckOutUser
data.comment: Managed property / alias name for Check out user field

data.name: FilterRefinerDocumentClient
data.comment: Managed property / alias name for Document Client field

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedAuthor
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned document authors

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedCheckOutUser
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned document check out user

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedDocumentClient
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned document client

data.name: GridViewColumnFomatter
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of values whose function definition is already defined

data.name: GridViewColumnPickerFields
data.value: Document;Client;Client.Matter ID;Modified date;Author;Document version;Checked out to;Created date
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of column options available in the column picker

data.name: GridViewColumnValueFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of managed properties, which are used to bind JSON data

data.name: GridViewColumnWidth
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of width of columns of grid view control

data.name: GridViewDefaultColumns
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of default columns in the grid view control. This list will be bypassed, if user selection exists

data.name: GridViewDocumentExtension
data.comment: Property name for document extension

data.name: GridViewDocumentOWAUrl
data.comment: Property name for document OWA URL

data.name: GridViewDocumentPath
data.comment: Property name for document path

data.name: GridViewDocumentSPWebUrl
data.comment: Property name for document SPWebURL

data.name: GridViewECBActions
data.value: Open this Document,editdocument;View Matter Details,gotoMatterSites;Pin this Document,pin;Unpin this Document,unpin
data.comment: Semicolon separated string of (comma separated string of actions,class) actions that are to be displayed in ECB menu

data.name: GridViewHeaderName
data.value: Check Box,NA;DocType,NA;Document,singleselect;ECB,NA;Client,singleselect;Client.Matter ID,NA;Modified date,date;Author,singleselect;Document version,NA;Checked out to,singleselect;Created date,date
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of name of the column headers of grid view control

data.name: GridViewMatterIDPropertyName
data.comment: This is the property name for matter ID

data.name: GridViewPinnedClientMatterIDPropertyName
data.comment: This is the property name for client.matter ID

data.name: GridViewNonDataColumns
data.comment: Name of non-data columns of grid view control

data.name: GridViewPinnedColumnValueFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of key names, which are used to bind JSON data

data.name: GridViewPinnedDocumentClientIDPropertyName
data.comment: This is the property name for client ID

data.name: GridViewPinnedMatterIDPropertyName
data.comment: This is the property name for matter ID

data.name: GridViewPinnedTitleProperty
data.comment: This is the property name for document title

data.name: GridViewTitleProperty
data.comment: This is the property name for document title

data.name: Loading_Document
data.value: Please wait while the documents load.
data.comment: This is a loading message when documents are loaded

data.name: No_Data_Message
data.comment: This message is displayed when no data is present

data.name: No_Data_String
data.comment: This is displayed when string is null or whitespace

data.name: No_Pinned_Documents
data.comment: This message is displayed when no documents are pinned

data.name: SearchDropdownFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated string of (comma separated string of options,class) options that are to be displayed in dropdown control

data.name: Search_Assigned_To_Me
data.comment: This text is displayed on auto-complete search options

data.name: Search_Entire_DMS
data.comment: This text is displayed on auto-complete search options

data.name: FilterRefinerCreated
data.comment: Managed property name for Created

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedCreatedDate
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned document created date

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedModifiedDate
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned document modified date

data.name: GridViewECBActionsTitle
data.value: View this document$|$Go to this document\'s matter details$|$Add this document to Pinned Documents$|$Remove this document from Pinned Documents
data.comment: $|$ separated list of title for ECB actions

data.name: GridViewHeaderNameTitle
data.value: Select all$|$Doc type$|$Click to sort by document name$|$$|$Click to sort by client name$|$Click to sort by Client.Matter ID$|$Click to sort by last modified date$|$Click to sort by document author$|$Click to sort by version$|$Click to sort by who has documents checked out$|$Click to sort by created date
data.comment: $|$ separated list of title for Grid view header

data.name: GridViewECBMenuTitle
data.value: Click to view the document menu
data.comment: Title for grid view ECB menu title

data.name: AttachButtonText
data.comment: Text for attach and send button

data.name: AttachFailureMessage
data.value: One or more of your selected documents failed to attach:
data.comment: Message to be displayed in case of failure while attaching documents

data.name: AttachInProgressMessage
data.value:
Attaching of {0} documents...
Do not close Matter Center until all documents are attached.
data.comment: Message to be displayed while attaching documents is in progress

data.name: AttachSuccessMessage
data.comment: Message to be displayed in case of success while attaching documents

data.name: MaxAttachedMessage
data.value: Do not select more than five documents to attach at one time.
data.comment: Message to be displayed if user selects more than allowed number of attachments

data.name: Event_Name_Attach_Document
data.comment: App Insight event name for attaching documents
